title: Letters and Words Q to Z

content: Learners can recognize letters words starting with Q to Z.
Learners can say some words starting with Q to Z.

content.text: q for queen, r for robot,
s for sun, t for tree.
BIG V, BIG V, BIG W
BIG X, and Y and Z
small v, small v, small w
small x and y and z.
